Key Match Events: The Pistons won the game 99-95, avoiding overtime after a close contest.
Malik Beasley scored 20 points, and Cade Cunningham recorded a double-double with 15 points and 10 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons' win was seen as a crucial step toward the championship.
Fans celebrated the team's 2-0 record in the NBA Cup and their improving performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons are now 6-8 on the year and have won 6 of their last 10 games.
